about_the_game:
Dream of the Eight Immortals "is a 2D turn based online game based on the traditional Chinese myth of" The Eight Immortals' Journey to the East ". The game subverts the traditional mode and makes all the gods and monsters "cute". The Q-version style makes the game very fresh and cute, making people unconsciously "drunk" in it. The unpredictable weather, fun filled cards, and evolving mounts, among other innovative content and gameplay, add more fun to the game. The exquisite graphics and gorgeous combat skills will provide players with extraordinary enjoyment from a visual perspective.

Character walking:

In the game screen, the character controlled by the player is located near the center of the screen. When you need to move your position, hover the mouse over the desired location and click the left mouse button. You can also press and hold the left mouse button for two seconds, and the character will move along with the direction of the mouse.

Character turn:

When the character is standing still, clicking the right mouse button can command the character to turn in the direction pointed by the mouse.

Items used:

Left click on the package at the bottom of the screen to open the props bar. Move the mouse over an item in the props bar and right-click to use it.

Destruction of items:

Left click on an item in the props bar, grab it and move it outside the props bar. Click the left button again to destroy the item (need to confirm once).

Dialogue with NPC:

Walk up to the NPC, hover the mouse over it, and click the left button to have a conversation with it.

In the game, system settings can be used to adjust some attributes of the graphics and sound, as well as certain state settings. Its main functions include display resolution selection, particle effects switch, background music, battle music, sound effects switch and size adjustment, item acceptance switch, and team switch.
